medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started around 9 am this morning, initially mostly left-sided and felt like menstrual cramps. The patient experienced mild improvement after taking Motrin, but the pain returned in the right lower quadrant (RLQ) and worsened with any movement. Low-grade fever of 99Â°F at home. Denied chills, nausea, vomiting, or diarrhea. Experienced mild constipation but had a normal bowel movement after taking milk of magnesia.
medical_history.family_history: Diabetes mellitus, coronary artery disease, colon cancer in grandparents.
